sn46.6:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakete viharati anjanavane migadaye.
sn46.6:1.2: Atha kho kundaliyo paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn46.6:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho kundaliyo paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn46.6:1.5: Tassa mayham, bho gotama, pacchabhattam bhuttapatarasassa ayamacaro hoti—
sn46.6:1.6: aramena aramam uyyanena uyyanam anucankamami anuvicarami.
sn46.6:1.7: So tattha passami eke samanabrahmane itivadappamokkhanisamsanceva katham kathente uparambhanisamsanca:
sn46.6:2.1: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhamma bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti”ti?
sn46.6:2.2: “Satta kho, kundaliya, bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti”ti.
sn46.6:2.3: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhamma bhavita bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti”ti?
sn46.6:2.4: “Cattaro kho, kundaliya, satipatthana bhavita bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti”ti.
sn46.6:2.5: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhamma bhavita, bahulikata cattaro satipatthane paripurenti”ti?
sn46.6:2.6: “Tini kho, kundaliya, sucaritani bhavitani bahulikatani cattaro satipatthane paripurenti”ti.
sn46.6:2.7: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhamma bhavita bahulikata tini sucaritani paripurenti”ti?
sn46.6:2.8: “Indriyasamvaro kho, kundaliya, bhavito bahulikato tini sucaritani paripuretiti.
sn46.6:3.1: Katham bhavito ca, kundaliya, indriyasamvaro katham bahulikato tini sucaritani paripuretiti?
sn46.6:3.2: Idha, kundaliya, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva manapam nabhijjhati nabhihamsati, na ragam janeti.
sn46.6:3.3: Tassa thito ca kayo hoti, thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
sn46.6:3.4: Cakkhuna kho paneva rupam disva amanapam na manku hoti appatitthitacitto adinamanaso abyapannacetaso.
sn46.6:3.5: Tassa thito ca kayo hoti thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
sn46.6:4.1: Puna caparam, kundaliya, bhikkhu sotena saddam sutva …pe…
sn46.6:4.5: manasa dhammam vinnaya manapam nabhijjhati nabhihamsati, na ragam janeti.
sn46.6:4.6: Tassa thito ca kayo hoti, thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
sn46.6:4.7: Manasa kho paneva dhammam vinnaya amanapam na manku hoti appatitthitacitto adinamanaso abyapannacetaso.
sn46.6:4.8: Tassa thito ca kayo hoti, thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
sn46.6:5.1: Yato kho, kundaliya, bhikkhuno cakkhuna rupam disva manapamanapesu rupesu thito ca kayo hoti, thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
sn46.6:5.6: manasa dhammam vinnaya manapamanapesu dhammesu thito ca kayo hoti, thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
sn46.6:5.7: Evam bhavito kho, kundaliya, indriyasamvaro evam bahulikato tini sucaritani paripureti.
sn46.6:6.1: Katham bhavitani ca, kundaliya, tini sucaritani katham bahulikatani cattaro satipatthane paripurenti?
sn46.6:6.2: Idha, kundaliya, bhikkhu kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveti, vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveti, manoduccaritam pahaya manosucaritam bhaveti.
sn46.6:6.3: Evam bhavitani kho, kundaliya, tini sucaritani evam bahulikatani cattaro satipatthane paripurenti.
sn46.6:7.1: Katham bhavita ca, kundaliya, cattaro satipatthana katham bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti?
sn46.6:7.2: Idha, kundaliya, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn46.6:7.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn46.6:7.6: Evam bhavita kho, kundaliya, cattaro satipatthana evam bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti.
sn46.6:8.1: Katham bhavita ca, kundaliya, satta bojjhanga katham bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti?
sn46.6:8.2: Idha, kundaliya, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …pe…
sn46.6:8.3: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.6:8.4: Evam bhavita kho, kundaliya, satta bojjhanga evam bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti”ti.
sn46.6:9.1: Evam vutte, kundaliyo paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn46.6:9.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evameva bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn46.6:9.4: Esaham bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn46.6:9.5: Upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
